name: Cursed Mummies
description:
Cursed Mummies is a classic Sokoban.

An ancient curse was placed on the Pharaoh, and after the death of the Pharaoh, he was imprisoned in a deep tomb. The mummy wants to get out, but it will have to pass a lot of tests to open the way up, you need to put the sarcophagi in special places that would open the next levels.

With each level, the task will become more difficult, so you will have to think hard to solve the next puzzle... good luck!
